author: suburbandad_
content:
<@892053833121923094> the 0.2.1 release of the execution-spec-test fixtures seems to have two filled withdrawals tests without withdrawals in their candidate block rlp::
- withdrawals_use_value_in_contract
- withdrawals_balance_within_block

When I re-fill the tests using `evm` from the go-ethereum withdrawals-timestamp branch, all of the withdrawals tests fill correctly.  Would you check and (possibly) re-release ?  I am trying to work the execution spec test into the besu ci pipeline and was hoping to use versioned fixtures.
